title: runtime/race: RaceAsFunc3 and many others are flaky
body:
FreeBSD race flake:

http://build.golang.org/log/e9536db3f2c81412f3cc2225ba19c60d34ad06e2

```
freebsd-amd64-race at 9d6427d8992b05445029f95c9555820675dd2e3e
...
RaceAsFunc1                              .
RaceAsFunc2                              .
RaceAsFunc3                              FAILED
NoRaceAsFunc4                            .
RaceHeapParam                            .
...
```
